name: Pickle By The Sea
address: Lot PT 844 & PT 845, Gurney Drive, Bandar Tanjong, 10250 George Town, Penang
description: Penang's largest pickleball venue with 16 outdoor courts along scenic Gurney Drive. Popular for its seaside atmosphere and night play under floodlights.

name: G.O.A.T Pickle Club
description: High-energy outdoor club with 12 courts, coaching programmes, and a vibrant community of competitive players.

name: Spin & Smash Pickleball Hub
address: Lot 188, Jalan Burma, Pulau Tikus, 10350 George Town, Penang
description: 10-court outdoor hub in the heart of George Town, offering walk-in play, leagues, and coaching for all levels.

name: Pickle Land
address: Lot No. C1, C2 & C3, D'Piazza Mall, Jalan Mahsuri, Bayan Baru, 11900 Penang
description: Fully indoor 9-court facility in Bayan Baru with air conditioning, pro shop, and equipment rental.

name: Heritage Courts
address: 457, Jalan Burma, Pulau Tikus, 10350 George Town, Penang
description: Premium indoor venue near the UNESCO heritage zone with 8 cushioned vinyl courts and full amenities.

name: Pickle Lab
address: 244P, Jelutong Barat, Taman Ara, Gembira Parade, 11600 George Town, Penang
description: Boutique indoor facility focused on player development with 6 courts, video analysis, and private coaching.

name: PickleGen
address: 78, Lintang Bayan, Giant Bayan Baru, 11900 Bayan Lepas, Penang
description: Modern 7-court indoor centre in Bayan Baru catering to families and beginners with structured programmes.

name: PickleSquad
address: 5129 Jalan Siram, Kampung Siram, 12100 Butterworth, Penang
description: Mainland Penang's go-to venue with 8 outdoor courts, floodlights for evening play, and regular tournaments.

name: Penang Pickleball Club
address: PT815, Jalan Bukit Tambun, Juru, 14000 Bukit Mertajam, Penang
description: Community-focused indoor club in Bukit Mertajam with 6 courts, social events, and beginner-friendly sessions.

name: Picklemotion
address: 163D, Persiaran Gurney, Gurney Paragon Mall, 10250 George Town, Penang
description: Compact 4-court outdoor venue on Gurney Drive, great for casual play with scenic ocean views.

name: Play! Tennis Malaysia
description: Multi-sport facility in George Town offering 3 indoor pickleball courts alongside tennis and badminton.

name: PickleSky Penang
address: Lot No. 2-1A, Sunshine Mall, Sunshine Central, Jalan Thean Tek, 11500 Ayer Itam, Penang
description: Indoor 6-court venue in Bayan Lepas with rooftop courts, LED lighting, and a lounge area for spectators.
